title: Questions on Ranked
body: I have been promoted to s5 2-3 weeks ago and haven't played ranked ever since, what would happen if I lost a game of ranked when I just got a new division and haven't played ranked in those 2-3 weeks. Does my grace period go away? Please help.

replies.body: a new division you cant drop from.... cause its kinda like a milestone, and riot awards you a silver banner to show your attained a certain level of skill

yea well... thats actually not true, at all.

You can drop from a division if you lose too much

Losing many games during/ after the grace period so that your MMR does eventually drop to a full tier below you. Or so many games even if your MMR  doesn't drop that far but it appears to the system that you are struggling

Actually there's two situations you can drop a division in:

1. You decay due to inactivity (only happens Plat+ nowadays I believe)
2. Your hidden MMR is significantly below your tier (e.g. you're Silver V 0 LP and you're playing with Bronze IV-V players).

The first situation isn't applicable to you, the second situation will only tend to happen if you got boosted or you decide to switch roles or something.
if i remember correctly you need to lose 9 or so games in a row for the demotion of a league
